name: Sumutasu Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an AI-based real estate marketplace intended to help homeowners to sell their properties. The company's marketplace offers a range of real estate services including the direct purchase and sale of real estate assets, enabling clients in the real estate industry to complete real estate deals in a convenient and hassle-free manner.
